data.eml:eml: Revision of Taiwanaenidea Kimoto, 1984 (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Chi-Feng, Beenen, Ron (2015): Revision of Taiwanaenidea Kimoto, 1984 (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae). Zootaxa 4020 (1): 153-168, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4020.1.6
